attributes.action: Create a cross party group to work out a brexit strategy that can be supported.
attributes.background: Parliament is deadlocked. MPs from all sides need to come together to devise a brexit strategy. Once consensus is gained, all MPs must be whipped to support the strategy.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it sounds like you are asking political parties, rather than Parliament as a whole, to take action. 

In particular, whipping is the responsibility of political parties.

You could start a new petition calling on the House of Commons to set up a cross-party Committee to agree a Brexit strategy if that is something you would like to happen.
